EXSLTSetTrailing.summary: set:trailing() returns the nodes in one node-set that come after the first node in the other node-set.
EXSLTSetTrailing.returns:
A node-set containing the nodes from nodeSet1 whose values follow the first node in nodeSet2.
NOTENote: If the first node in nodeSet2 isn't contained in nodeSet1, an empty set is returned. If nodeSet2 is empty, then the result is nodeSet1.
